languages.text: Вистенца подчиняется, но не другие культисты. Пытаясь скрыть ритуал, они совершают смертельную ошибку, и происходит грандиозная варп-манифестация. Чудом выжившая Вьятт пытается задобрить Вольного Торговца щедрыми дарами.

Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.
languages.original_text: Вистенца подчиняется, но не другие культисты. Пытаясь скрыть ритуал, они совершают смертельную ошибку, и происходит грандиозная варп-манифестация. Чудом выжившая Вьятт пытается задобрить Вольного Торговца щедрыми дарами.

traits.locale_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with plentiful gifts.
Despite it being forbidden, Vistenza's henchmen still attempt the ritual. Twisted by witchcraft, Janus bears even more fruit.

Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.
Despite it being forbidden, Vistenza's henchmen still attempt the ritual. Twisted by witchcraft, Janus bears even more fruit.

Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with plentiful gifts.

Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

languages.text: Dame Vyatt obéit, mais les autres cultistes font de la résistance. En tentant d'effacer toute trace du rituel, ils commettent une erreur fatale et déclenchent une puissante manifestation du Warp. Ayant miraculeusement survécu, dame Vyatt cherche à présent à apaiser {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à grand renfort de présents somptueux.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

traits.locale_text: Dame Vyatt obéit, mais les autres cultistes font de la résistance. En tentant d'effacer toute trace du rituel, ils commettent une erreur fatale et déclenchent une puissante manifestation du Warp. Ayant miraculeusement survécu, dame Vyatt cherche à présent à apaiser {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à grand renfort de présents somptueux.

languages.text: レディ・ビャットは従ったものの、他の教団員は従わなかった。儀式の痕跡を隠そうとした彼らは致命的なミスを犯し、強力な〈歪み〉現象を引き起こしてしまった。奇跡的に生き残ったレディ・ビャットは豪奢な贈り物で自由開拓者を懐柔しようとしている。
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

traits.locale_text: レディ・ビャットは従ったものの、他の教団員は従わなかった。儀式の痕跡を隠そうとした彼らは致命的なミスを犯し、強力な〈歪み〉現象を引き起こしてしまった。奇跡的に生き残ったレディ・ビャットは豪奢な贈り物で自由開拓者を懐柔しようとしている。

languages.text: 维亚特女士服从行商浪人的命令，但其他邪教徒并不服从。他们打算隐藏仪式留下来的痕迹，但在这个过程中，他们犯了个致命的错误，将强大的亚空间恶魔召唤到了仪式现场。维亚特女士奇迹般地活了下来，如今，她希望能通过慷慨的进贡，安抚行商浪人的怒火。
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

traits.locale_text: 维亚特女士服从行商浪人的命令，但其他邪教徒并不服从。他们打算隐藏仪式留下来的痕迹，但在这个过程中，他们犯了个致命的错误，将强大的亚空间恶魔召唤到了仪式现场。维亚特女士奇迹般地活了下来，如今，她希望能通过慷慨的进贡，安抚行商浪人的怒火。

languages.text: Lady Vyatt obedece, pero los demás cultistas no siguen su ejemplo. En sus intentos por ocultar todo rastro del ritual, cometen un terrible error que provoca una poderosa manifestación de la disformidad. Lady Vyatt sobrevive milagrosamente y pretende aplacar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente con generosos regalos.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

traits.locale_text: Lady Vyatt obedece, pero los demás cultistas no siguen su ejemplo. En sus intentos por ocultar todo rastro del ritual, cometen un terrible error que provoca una poderosa manifestación de la disformidad. Lady Vyatt sobrevive milagrosamente y pretende aplacar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente con generosos regalos.

languages.text: Lady Vyatt gehorcht, die anderen Kultisten jedoch nicht. Bei ihrem Versuch, alle Spuren des Rituals zu verbergen, unteräluft ihnen ein fataler Fehler und sie lösen eine mächtige Warp-Manifestierung aus. Lady Vyatt hat auf wundersame Weise überlebt und möchte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nun mit großzügigen Geschenken besänftigen.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

traits.locale_text: Lady Vyatt gehorcht, die anderen Kultisten jedoch nicht. Bei ihrem Versuch, alle Spuren des Rituals zu verbergen, unteräluft ihnen ein fataler Fehler und sie lösen eine mächtige Warp-Manifestierung aus. Lady Vyatt hat auf wundersame Weise überlebt und möchte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nun mit großzügigen Geschenken besänftigen.

languages.text: Leydi Vyatt itaat etse de diğer tarikatçılar etmiyor. Ayinin tüm izlerini gizlemeye çalışırken ölümcül bir hata yapıp güçlü bir öteboyut tezahürünü tetikliyorlar. Mucizevi bir şekilde hayatta kalan Leydi Vyatt, Hür Tacir'i cömert armağanlarla yatıştırmaya çalışıyor.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt obeys, but the other cultists do not. In their attempts to hide all traces of the ritual, they make a fatal mistake, triggering a powerful warp manifestation. Lady Vyatt, having miraculously survived, now seeks to appease the Rogue Trader with lavish gifts.

traits.locale_text: Leydi Vyatt itaat etse de diğer tarikatçılar etmiyor. Ayinin tüm izlerini gizlemeye çalışırken ölümcül bir hata yapıp güçlü bir öteboyut tezahürünü tetikliyorlar. Mucizevi bir şekilde hayatta kalan Leydi Vyatt, Hür Tacir'i cömert armağanlarla yatıştırmaya çalışıyor.
